General.Name: Alla Public Company Limited
General.Description: Alla Public Company Limited imports, manufactures, and distributes cranes and electric hoists, industrial doors, loading docks, electronic lifts, PVC strip curtains, and warehouse management systems, and related parts and other equipment in Thailand. The company provides crane and hoist, includes single and double ginder overhead, gantry, wall and pillar jib, wall traveling, and suspension cranes; and electric chain and wire rope, manual chain, monorail, and explosion proof hoists. It also offers industrial, fire-resistant, and cold room doors; and dock levelers, dock shelters, plastic curtains, and accessory equipment; warehouse solution products comprise high volume low speed fans, logistic containers, handling equipment, air curtains, and racking accessories, as well as ranking and shelving products; and installs solar cell panels. In addition, it provides automatic car parking systems, such as tower parking, cabinet type/circular type parking, puzzle parking, rotary parking, two post car lift, and car elevator and turntable; and installation and after-sales services. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
